D ow nloaded from http:/
Due to errors in the production process, the incorrect title was published. The title should read “More intensive therapy as more effective treatment for frail patients with multiple myeloma.” The publisher apologizes for the error.

title: DuMontier C, La J, Bihn J, etal. More intensive therapy has a better effect for frail parents with multiple myeloma. Blood Adv. 2023;7(20):6275-6284
